recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes perfect for a weekend breakfast. These classic pancakes are light, airy, and golden brown.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat eggs and then whisk in milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Don't overmix.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour ¼ cup of batter for each pancake onto the griddle.
Cook until bubbles form on surface and edges look dry, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve hot with maple syrup and butter.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh and crispy Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken breast, homemade croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then grill until cooked through.
Toss bread cubes with olive oil and garlic, then bake until golden for croutons.
Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Make dressing by whisking together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and half the parmesan.
Slice the grilled chicken into strips.
Toss lettuce with dressing in a large bowl.
Top with chicken strips, croutons, and remaining parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately while croutons are still crispy.

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and flavorful beef stir fry with fresh vegetables in a savory sauce. Perfect for a weeknight dinner.
instructions: Marinate sliced beef with 1 tablespoon soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove and set aside.
Add vegetables to the same pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Return beef to pan and add remaining soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Stir everything together and cook for 1-2 minutes more.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies that are crispy on the edges and tender in the center. A classic favorite!
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in the flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown around edges.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

recipes.name: Fresh Fruit Smoothie
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy smoothie packed with fresh fruits and yogurt. Perfect for breakfast or a post-workout snack.
instructions: Add banana, berries, and yogurt to a blender.
Pour in milk and add honey for sweetness.
Add ice cubes for a thicker, colder smoothie.
Blend on high speed for 60-90 seconds until smooth and creamy.
Taste and adjust sweetness with more honey if needed.
Add chia seeds and pulse briefly to mix in.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
Garnish with fresh berries or mint leaves if desired.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple yet delicious avocado toast topped with fresh ingredients. A healthy and satisfying breakfast option.
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden brown and crispy.
Cut avocado in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Spread mashed avocado evenly on toast slices.
Top with sliced cherry tomatoes.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.
Garnish with fresh herbs like cilantro or basil.
Serve immediately while toast is still warm.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a crispy homemade crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Transfer dough to pizza pan or parchment paper.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over dough, leaving border for crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices and tomato slices on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and immediately top with fresh basil leaves.
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian tiramisu with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone. A decadent dessert that's worth the effort.
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar in a double boiler until thick and pale.
Remove from heat and whisk in mascarpone until smooth.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream to stiff peaks.
Gently fold whipped cream into mascarpone mixture.
Combine espresso and coffee liqueur in a shallow dish.
Quickly dip each ladyfinger in coffee mixture and arrange in dish.
Spread half the mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers.
Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and remaining cream.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.
